definitions.definition: the process in a woman of discharging blood and other materials from the lining of the uterus at intervals of about one lunar month from puberty until menopause, except during pregnancy.
examples: period, menses, menorrhea, menstrual cycle; Moremenarche; informalone's/that time of the month; informal,the curse "first menstruation is a milestone of puberty"Moremenarche; one's/that time of the month; the curse first menstruation is a milestone of puberty
